messages.msgSnippet: We have a lovely new page of info on Takeda Kanryuusai just up courtesy Sanada & Masayoshi.  Also,  Tama gave me a lot of cool Itou Kashitaro info I need to
messages.messageBody:
We have a lovely new page of info on Takeda Kanryuusai just up courtesy
Sanada & Masayoshi. Also, Tama gave me a lot of cool Itou Kashitaro
info I need to organize for the next installment in our Facts section .

Http://www.shinsengumihq.com

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
